## How to style expansion

Styles from the `material/expansion` package can be customized using the `expansion-overrides` mixin.  This mixin accepts a set of tokens that control how the components will look, either for the entire app or under a specific selector. For example:

```
@use '@angular/material' as mat;

// Customize the entire app. Change :root to your selector if you want to scope the styles.
:root {
  @include mat.expansion-overrides((
    container-background-color: orange,
    container-text-color: red,
  ));
}
```

You can find the full list of supported mixins and tokens below.

### Tokens supported by `expansion-overrides`

Filter by name

Filter by type

Reset filters

| Name | Type | Based on system token |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `container-shape` content\_copy | Base | None |
| `legacy-header-indicator-display` content\_copy | Base | None |
| `header-indicator-display` content\_copy | Base | None |
| `container-background-color` content\_copy | Color | `--mat-sys-surface` content\_copy |
| `container-text-color` content\_copy | Color | `--mat-sys-on-surface` content\_copy |
| `actions-divider-color` content\_copy | Color | `--mat-sys-outline` content\_copy |
| `header-hover-state-layer-color` content\_copy | Color | `--mat-sys-on-surface` content\_copy |
| `header-focus-state-layer-color` content\_copy | Color | `--mat-sys-on-surface` content\_copy |
| `header-disabled-state-text-color` content\_copy | Color | `--mat-sys-on-surface` content\_copy |
| `header-text-color` content\_copy | Color | `--mat-sys-on-surface` content\_copy |
| `header-description-color` content\_copy | Color | `--mat-sys-on-surface-variant` content\_copy |
| `header-indicator-color` content\_copy | Color | `--mat-sys-on-surface-variant` content\_copy |
| `header-text-font` content\_copy | Typography | `--mat-sys-title-medium-font` content\_copy |
| `header-text-size` content\_copy | Typography | `--mat-sys-title-medium-size` content\_copy |
| `header-text-weight` content\_copy | Typography | `--mat-sys-title-medium-weight` content\_copy |
| `header-text-line-height` content\_copy | Typography | `--mat-sys-title-medium-line-height` content\_copy |
| `header-text-tracking` content\_copy | Typography | `--mat-sys-title-medium-tracking` content\_copy |
| `container-text-font` content\_copy | Typography | `--mat-sys-body-large-font` content\_copy |
| `container-text-line-height` content\_copy | Typography | `--mat-sys-body-large-line-height` content\_copy |
| `container-text-size` content\_copy | Typography | `--mat-sys-body-large-size` content\_copy |
| `container-text-tracking` content\_copy | Typography | `--mat-sys-body-large-tracking` content\_copy |
| `container-text-weight` content\_copy | Typography | `--mat-sys-body-large-weight` content\_copy |
| `header-collapsed-state-height` content\_copy | Density | None |
| `header-expanded-state-height` content\_copy | Density | None |
